name: spo-copy-directory-structure-to-sharepoint-list
title: Copy the folder structure of a directory to a SharePoint list
shortDescription: Copies the folder structure of a directory to a SharePoint list and trigger an migration using the Migration Manager
longDescription: Migrate file shares to SharePoint? Get all the individual directories int a SharePoint list so that we can trigger an migration using the SharePoint Migration Manager

thumbnails.alt: A preview image of Copy the folder structure of a directory to a sharepoint list

references.name: Want to learn more about the Microsoft Graph
references.description: Check out the documentation site to get started and for the reference to the endpoints.
